title: Backend Engineer - Box Team
description:
**About Us**
 In 2022, Instabee was founded after combining Budbee and Instabox - two leading last-mile delivery companies with three consumer-facing brands: Budbee, Instabox, and Porterbuddy. Instabee serves millions of consumers across Europe with convenient deliveries and is on track to become the leading European e-commerce enabler. Always with the consumer at heart.
   

  

 We’re fast, both in terms of parcel delivery and when it comes to growing our business. So far our journey has taken us from Sweden to the rest of Scandinavia and parts of continental Europe, but we have no plans on stopping anytime soon. As we continue to expand, the complexity of Instabee grows in parallel. With that in mind, we’re now looking for you to help us on the journey ahead.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We’re now looking for an experienced
 **Backend Developer** 
 to join our
 **Box Team** 
 and shape the future of one of Sweden’s most impactful delivery products: our Box systems. Your work will ensure they operate seamlessly—no matter the circumstances.
   

  

 In this role, you'll focus on designing, building, and maintaining the systems that power our parcel box network, from scaling backend services in the cloud to ensuring reliable operation even with unstable connectivity and unexpected user behaviors. You'll be involved in technical decision-making, architecture, and hands-on coding, making this an excellent opportunity for those who thrive on solving complex challenges.
   

  

 With us, you’ll have the chance to make a big impact on both the technology we use and the experience we provide to our users, working closely with our product, design, and other engineering teams.
   

  

**Your future team**
 The Box Team is responsible for developing and maintaining all software related to our box network and its backend systems. As an autonomous team, we take full ownership of our product. From design to deployment, allowing us to move quickly, experiment, and innovate. As a key part of this team, you’ll work on creating robust, scalable, and innovative solutions that ensure our box services run smoothly across Europe. Collaboration and communication are at the heart of what we do, and your expertise will be vital to our continued success.
   

  

**What We're Looking For**
 We are looking for a communicative senior engineer with at least 5 years of work experience - If you are a skilled problem solver who loves coding, collaborating and making complex things work, then this is the place for you! We value individuals who are keen to learn, and your eagerness to develop your skill set will probably be your strongest asset when joining us. Beyond that we imagine that you have the following:
   

  

* 5+ years of experience as a Backend Developer, in a modern tech environment
* Proficiency in Golang
* Experience with Node.js, React, MQTT is a plus.
* Hands-on experience with Kubernetes, Terraform, and GCP (or another cloud provider).
* Experience in working with an agile development methodology.
* Experience with IoT is a big plus since the team is responsible for managing the software of our Box fleet.
* While we are looking for a Backend Developer the team does frontend development as well, with the most critical one being the UI on the boxes. If you are interested in it, there are opportunities to work on frontend tasks as well.


**What You’ll Get**
 We can promise you that you will be challenged, develop your skills and have the opportunity to work with truly amazing and competent colleagues. If you like changes and want to set new processes and ways of working - this is the place for you!
   

  

**Benefits**
 Of course, we have all the necessary and standard benefits in place, but in addition to this, we can also offer:
   

  

 🌇 Sky-High Office: Modern and newly renovated with a 360-degree view around Stockholm.
   

  

 🐶 Puppy Friendly: Bring your dog to work - we've got a whole floor for our furry friends!
   

  

 🍸 Rooftop Fridays: Chill out at our Friday rooftop bar with the best views in town
   

  

 🥐 Wednesdays Tech Breakfasts: Fuel your midweek with tech talks and tasty bites.
   

  

 👾 Tech Demos: Dive into the latest innovations with our regular tech showcases.
   

  

 💻 Modern Tech Stack: Work with cutting-edge technology every day.
   

  

 🏓 Fun & Games: Ping pong, Shuffleboard, Foosball, and even a Karaoke Room for your leisure time.
   

  

 ⏰ Flexible Hours: Hybrid setup with working hours that adapt to your lifestyle.
   

  

 👶 Parental Pay for Six Months: Step away from work and provide the best care
   

  

 and love to your little one.
   

  

 🎂 A Day Off on Your Birthday: We love to celebrate, so enjoy your birthday to the fullest with a day off each year!
   

  

 Diversity and inclusion is very important to us and we are committed to creating an inclusive work environment. We want to be a workplace where everyone’s perspectives and opinions are valued, and we are dedicated to creating opportunities for all employees to thrive and reach their full potential.
   

  

*This recruitment process consists of background checks via Verifiera as a review of previous public criminal records. The result is public information that is handled confidentially. This is mandatory for all recruitment processes at Instabee (Instabox/Budbee) in Sweden.*

title: Linux/C++/Python Developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Job Description**
 We are particularly interested in candidates with solid experience in Linux development, MQTT, Python, and C++, as well as expertise in certificate management and installation.
   

  

 The ideal candidate should also have strong knowledge of software build pipelines, software architecture, and topologies, along with a solid understanding of over-the-air updates and system integration. We are looking for someone who is not only technically skilled but also possesses strong social skills, is communicative, curious, and eager to learn and grow with us.
   

  

**Application deadline:** 
 07-02-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Senior Developer
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Business Consulting and Services
description:
What makes Cognizant a unique place to work? The combination of rapid growth and an international and innovative environment! This is creating a lot of opportunities for people like YOU — people with an entrepreneurial spirit who want to make a difference in this world.
   

  

 At Cognizant, together with your colleagues from all around the world, you will collaborate on creating solutions for the world's leading companies and help them become more flexible, more innovative and successful. And this is your chance to be part of the success story: we are looking for a Desk Side Support to join our CIS DWP Digital support\DSS Team.
   

  

****About Cognizant****
 Cognizant is one of the world's leading professional services companies, transforming clients' business, operating, and technology models for the digital era. Our unique industry-based, consultative approach helps clients envision, build, and run more innovative and efficient businesses. Headquartered in the U.S., Cognizant (a member of the NASDAQ-100 and one of Forbes World’s Best Employers 2024) is consistently listed among the most admired companies in the world. Learn how Cognizant helps clients lead with digital at www.cognizant.com
   

  

 We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated
 **IOS Developer** 
 , a multi faceted engineer working independently from customer stakeholders and support the extended team at various delivery locations and work very closely with customer Business and IT Stakeholders.
   

  

****Key Responsibilities****
* Mobile developer with Android, ioS, adobe, React JS, adobe analytics, type script
* Thorough devops experience and knowledge of Devops tools.


****What You Can Expect****
* Become part of a the ‘flag ship’ success story - We go through enormous growth!
* Based in the Benelux – we have offices in Amsterdam, Eindhoven and Brussels within an European and Global network
* Organization driven by technology – We have a tremendous technology backbone
* Open, ‘can do’ team spirit
* Environment where you can make your own ideas reality
* Drive your own career
* Market conforms benefits


****About Cognizant****
 Cognizant is one of the world’s leading professional services companies, transforming clients’ business, operating and technology models for the digital era. Our unique industry-based, consultative approach helps clients envision, build and run more innovative and efficient businesses. Headquartered in the U.S., Cognizant, a member of the NASDAQ-100, is ranked 205 on the Fortune 500 and is consistently listed among the most admired companies in the world.
   

  

**The Cognizant community**
 We are a high caliber team who appreciate and support one another. Our people uphold an energetic, collaborative and inclusive workplace where everyone can thrive.
   

  

* Cognizant is a global community with more than 300,000+ associates around the world.
* We don’t just dream of a better way – we make it happen.
* We take care of our people, clients, company, communities and climate by doing what’s right.
* We foster an innovative environment where you can build the career path that’s right for you.


****About Us** 
 :**
 Cognizant is one of the world's leading professional services companies, transforming clients' business, operating, and technology models for the digital era. Our unique industry-based, consultative approach helps clients envision, build, and run more innovative and efficient businesses. Headquartered in the U.S., Cognizant (a member of the NASDAQ-100 and one of Forbes World’s Best Employers 2024) is consistently listed among the most admired companies in the world. Learn how Cognizant helps clients lead with digital at www.cognizant.com
   

  

**Our commitment to diversity and inclusion**
 Cognizant is an equal opportunity employer that embraces diversity, champions equity and values inclusion. We are dedicated to nurturing a community where everyone feels heard, accepted and welcome. Your application and candidacy will not be considered based on race, color, sex, religion, creed, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, genetic information, pregnancy, veteran status or any other protected characteristic as outlined by federal, state or local laws.
   

  

 If you have a disability that requires reasonable accommodation to search for a job opening or submit an application, please email CareersNA2@cognizant.com with your request and contact information.
   

  

****Disclaimer:****
 Compensation information is accurate as of the date of this posting. Cognizant reserves the right to modify this information at any time, subject to applicable law.
   

  

 Applicants may be required to attend interviews in person or by video conference. In addition, candidates may be required to present their current state or government issued ID during each interview.

title: Full Stack Developer & Startup Founder (March 2025)
job_function: Information Technology, Business Development, and Strategy/Planning
company_industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals
description:
**Note: This Opportunity Does Not Offer Employment, but rather an opportunity to build your own VC-backed startup!** 




  





**Who you are:** 




 You are a highly accomplished full-stack software developer with a demonstrated ability to deliver innovative solutions. Your exceptional programming skills and experience in building complex applications position you to tackle significant challenges within the tech industry. You possess a strong problem-solving aptitude and a passion for pioneering cutting-edge technologies. Driven to make a real impact, you're eager to leverage your expertise in building disruptive tech ventures.
 



  





**About Antler** 




 Antler is the world's most active venture capital firm, providing funding from pre-seed to Series C. We invest in Founders who seek to define our tomorrow and reshape the world we live in with groundbreaking technological innovation. Every year, we handpick the strongest Founders from more than 135,000 applicants across our 27 locations on the globe, which has led us to work with more than 7,000 founders to date and a portfolio of more than 1,000 startups.
 



  





**The Antler Founder Residency** 




 Join a dynamic cohort of 200+ highly motivated entrepreneurs for an immersive 12-week program. Visit our website for a detailed breakdown of how we'll support your startup launch.
 


* 12-Week full-time Immersive Journey: Kicking off March, 2025, in Stockholm.
* Co-Founder Discovery: In the first 10 weeks, collaborate with fellow Founders to find your co-founder(s).
* Pitch to Invest: Present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee. Secure a net cash investment of EUR 100k for 10% equity.
* Accelerate Growth: If funded, we work closely with you to make your startup a success



  





**Program Details** 



* **Start Date:** 
 March 3rd, 2025
* **Location:** 
 Onsite at our Stockholm office
* **Compensation:** 
 While participants don't receive financial compensation during the program, pre-seed investment is available to jumpstart your venture.
* **Visa Sponsorship:** 
 Due to the non-employment nature of the program, visa sponsorship is unavailable.



  





**For our March 2025 cohort, we’re looking for someone who:** 



* Having the autonomy to develop sophisticated software solutions to address real-world challenges, merging ingenuity with functionality.
* Exceptional problem-solving and analytical skills, capable of breaking down complex issues and bringing structure into business cases
* Providing leadership, whether it’s directing a development team or managing comprehensive product delivery.
* You have an idea that you believe can solve a problem you are deeply interested in. You understand that you need co-pilots who share your vision and values.



  





**Application Process** 




 Our streamlined application process takes only 2-3 weeks:
 


1. Apply through our website.
2. Participate in an introductory interview.
3. Progress to an in-depth interview with our partners.
4. Receive a potential offer.



  





**Antler Success Stories** 




 Several companies built through the Antler program have received pre-seed investment and have gone on to secure significant funding rounds. Here are just a few examples:
 


* **Wingbits:** 
 A community-driven flight data tracking platform
* **Two:** 
 A comprehensive B2B payment suite simplifying sales for online and offline businesses.
* **Evyon:** 
 A developer of eco-friendly battery energy storage systems.
* **Glint Solar:** 
 Software accelerating the identification of optimal solar installation sites.
* **PerPlant:** 
 AI-powered sensor systems creating a gateway to sustainable agriculture.

title: Senior Software Engineer - ZEOS Logistics (all genders)
company_industry: Technology, Information and Internet, Retail, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Over the last years, we learned that solving fulfilment related challenges for the good of our customers helps us to fuel the growth of our platform. With more partners in Partner Program and Connected Retail joining our platform, we have been developing and testing additional fulfilment services tailored to their needs.
   

  

 The ZEOS Logistics department is responsible for all partner-facing Zalando Logistics Solutions. By unifying and collaborating these services under a single umbrella, we provide a more holistic approach to delivering the optimal fulfilment solution to meet our partners' needs and leverage common services to enable partner program growth.
   

  

 As a Software Engineer in ZEOS Logistics, you will develop and operate business-critical applications for our partners and internal stakeholders that process tens of thousands of events per second powering the critical partner-facing backend APIs and web applications of the partner fulfilment domain. You will work with tools and technologies such as Java, Kotlin, PostgreSQL, AWS, Kubernetes, and Elasticsearch in building high-performance, low-latency systems to create an impact on customers and partners.
   

  

**INCLUSIVE BY DESIGN**
 At Zalando, our vision is to be the starting point for fashion - one that is inclusive by design. We only assess candidates based on qualifications, merit, and business needs. We welcome applications from people of all gender identities, sexual orientations, personal expressions, racial identities, ethnicities, religious beliefs, and disability statuses. We only want to know why you’re great for this role, so please avoid including your picture, age, and marital status in your CV as well.
   

  

 We want to provide you with a great candidate experience. Please feel free to inform us of any accommodations you may need, so we can best support and assist you throughout the hiring process.
   

  

 do.BETTER - our diversity & inclusion strategy
   

  

 https //corporate.zalando.com/en/diversity-inclusion
   

  

 Our employee resource groups
   

  

 https //corporate.zalando.com/en/diversity-inclusion/our-employee-resource-groups
   

  

**WHAT WE’D LOVE YOU TO DO (AND LOVE DOING)...**
 Build and operate large-scale data streaming and processing applications serving fulfilment process relevant data with the latency of tens of milliseconds in magnitude to Zalando partners in using technologies such as Java, Kotlin, Postgres, and Elasticsearch.
   

  

 Use a state-of-the-art software development methodology.
   

  

 Be part of a newly established engineering team in Stockholm and help to foster an environment of continuous learning.
   

  

**WE’D LOVE TO MEET YOU IF..** 
 .
   

  

 5+ years of experience as a Software Engineer in developing APIs and high-volume data streaming and processing systems with either Java or Kotlin.
   

  

 Initial hands-on experience with SQL storage technologies.
   

  

 Familiarity with AWS, Kubernetes, and Elasticsearch is in addition a plus.
   

  

 "You build it, you run it" approach you have had a first experience in managing services end-to-end, from developing to deploying to monitoring and incident support is a big plus.
   

  

 Passion for working in an agile, cross-functional team, iterating quickly during the product development cycle. As well as, ability to communicate and collaborate effectively with business stakeholders, product managers, and engineering peers.
   

  

**OUR OFFER**
 Zalando provides a range of benefits, please ask your Talent Acquisition Partner to learn more about what we offer.
   

  

**About Zalando**
 It’s the perfect time to join Zalando on our journey, from being a pioneer in the world of e-commerce, to the starting point for fashion in Europe. We connect customers, brands, and partners across 23 markets.
   

  

 Help us drive digital and sustainable solutions for fashion, logistics, advertising and research, bringing head-to-toe fashion to almost 49 million active customers through a team of diverse skill-sets, cultural backgrounds, and interests.
   

  

 Our values https //jobs.zalando.com/en/our-founding-mindset
   

  

 do.More - our sustainability strategy https //corporate.zalando.com/en/sustainability Follow us on Instagram instagram.com/insidezalando
   

  

 Please note that all applications must be completed using the online form - we do not accept applications via email.

title: Tech Lead Manager
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 You will act as both Tech Lead and Manager, in a perfect mix of leading people (Team of Developers) and developing code. Our aim is to consolidate the team of developers that you will lead in Stockholm. You will collaborate with your Product Partner, regarding planning and building the right products at the right time. You will be responsible for defining clear goals for your team and lead them in delivering on those goals.
   

  

 Apart from this, you are also responsible for setting salaries, helping individuals on your team grow and developing, as well as contributing technically to the team.
   

  

 As Tech Lead Manager you have a holistic perspective and the ability to inspire and lead others. You love working with tech and have experience working as a developer, working with code reviews, testing and quality assurance. You have at least one area where your team can rely on you making strong technical contributions.
   

  

* Communicate and collaborate with stakeholders
* Define quarterly goals and do weekly follow-ups
* Support and make sure the team members are the best they can be
* Develop and coach your team members individually
* Facilitate daily stand-ups and advise on agile WoW
* Contribute technically (wherever your strong area is) to the team


**Requirements**
* MSc/BS in computer science or similar degree
* Experience working as a Manager for a Tech Team
* Working in different contexts and organisations
* Interest in leadership and developing teams
* Proficient in English, both verbal and written
* Business minded and able to see the big picture
* A natural leader who is caring and inspiring
* Able to communicate clearly, both with your team and stakeholders
* Well organized and goal oriented


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Fullstack Software Developer till Sigicom
description:
*Vill du arbeta i ett innovativt teknikföretag som är ledande inom miljömätningsteknik? På Sigicom får du följa ditt arbete från idé till färdig produkt i en innovativ och stabil miljö. Som Fullstack Software Developer blir du en del av vårt erfarna team, där teknik och affärsnytta går hand i hand.*
**Om Sigicom**
 Sigicom har i över 40 år utvecklat mätinstrument för professionella användare och är idag en ledande aktör inom miljömätningsteknik. Sigicoms produkter används för att skydda människor, natur och känsliga byggnader från skadliga eller störande ljud och vibrationer. Vi är marknadsledande och med starka kundrelationer skapar vi värde och enkelhet för våra kunder.
   

  

 På vårt huvudkontor i Liljeholmen i Stockholm driver vi hela produktutvecklingskedjan in-house och kombinerar ny och befintlig teknik där slutanvändaren i fokus avseende handhavande och kvalitet.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som Fullstack Software Developer blir du en del av vårt utvecklingsteam med cirka 20 ingenjörer inom mjukvara, hårdvara, firmware, mekanik och automation. Du kommer att arbeta i vårt SW-team, en grupp med djupgående erfarenhet av Sigicoms produkter och produktutveckling. Vi vill nu stärka teamet med ytterligare kompetens och söker en utvecklare som kan bidra till både befintliga system och framtida utvecklingsprojekt.
   

  

**I rollen kommer du att:**
* Designa, utveckla och underhålla fullstack-webbapplikationer.
* Bygga API:er, databaser och backend-tjänster.
* Samarbeta med UX/UI-designers, produktutvecklare och hårdvaruteam.
* Optimera befintliga system för skalbarhet och prestanda.
* Delta i kodgranskningar och förbättra utvecklingsprocesser.


**Din profil**
 Vi söker en tekniskt kunnig och erfaren utvecklare, gärna med fokus på backend och komplexa system. Vi arbetar med teknologier som React, Vue, Node.js och Python, och vi söker dig som har en stark förståelse för databaser, både SQL och NoSQL, samt erfarenhet av API-design.
   

  

**Vidare ser vi att du har:**
* Kunskap om molninfrastruktur (AWS eller Azure).
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD-pipelines.
* Insikt i enhets- och integrationstestning.
* God kommunikationsförmåga på svenska och engelska.


 Vi värdesätter dina personliga egenskaper högt. För att trivas hos oss behöver du vara samarbetsvillig och uppskatta en dynamisk miljö med olika personligheter. Du har ett genuint intresse för våra produkter och ser helheten – från teknik till affärsnytta. Dessutom har du ett strategiskt tänk och förstår hur din utveckling bidrar till slutprodukten och våra kunders behov.
   

  

**Meriterande:**
* Erfarenhet av miljöövervakningssystem eller IoT-lösningar.
* Kunskap om mikrotjänstarkitektur.
* Intresse för hårdvaruintegrerad mjukvara.


 Att välja Sigicom innebär att bli en del av ett framgångsrikt och innovativt svenskt, privatägt företag med en stark kultur och långsiktig vision. Som utvecklare på Sigicom får du möjlighet att arbeta med hela kedjan – från idé till färdig produkt – där du får stor påverkan på slutprodukten beträffande kvalitet och handhavande där allas insatser gör skillnad. Med god lönsamhet, starka kundrelationer och en familjär arbetsmiljö erbjuder vi en arbetsplats där du både kan påverka och utvecklas.
   

  

**Ansökan & kontakt**
 I den här rekryteringen samarbetar Sigicom med Wise IT. Vill du veta mer om jobbet, kontakta ansvarig rekryteringskonsult; Alexandra Karlsson på alexandra.karlsson@wiseit.se.
   

  

 Wise IT kan tyvärr inte ta emot ansökningar via e-post, då vi värnar om din personliga integritet. Urval och intervjuer sker löpande. Välkommen med din ansökan!

title: .NET Developer CRM
description:
Om rollen
   

  

**Utvecklare på Sopra Steria – skapa framtidens lösningar med oss!**
 Hos oss på Sopra Steria arbetar du med alla delar av utvecklingsprocessen, från koncept till implementation och förvaltning. Du får bryta ner komplexa problem och skapa anpassade lösningar till kunder med den allra senaste tekniken, med grund i Microsofts hela portfölj av tjänster. Som utvecklare i .NET rör vi oss över hela stacken, vilket gör att arbetsuppgifterna under en vecka kan variera. Att arbeta med Microsofts paraply av molntjänster, som dessutom ständigt utökas, gör att du kan bli specialist inom ditt kompetensområde, men ändå alltid ha mer att lära.
   

  

 Arbetsuppgifterna som utvecklare hos oss kan t.ex. innebära att:
   

  

* Anpassa funktionaliteten i Dynamics CRM genom utveckling av tillägg i C# och klientanpassningar i JavaScript/TypeScript
* Skapa .NET Core-applikationer för att integrera till och från Dynamics CRM
* Skapa low code-lösningar baserat på Power Apps och Power Automate
* Skapa förutsägbara och stabila releaser med verktyg som Azure DevOps, TeamCity, Octopus Deploy m.fl.


**Om dig**
* 3 års erfarenhet som utvecklare backend, C# .NET
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Power Apps, Power Automate, Dataverse, Azure eller andra kringliggande tjänster inom området
* God kommunikativ förmåga i svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift


**Varför välja Sopra Steria**
* Fokus på kompetensutveckling och din personliga utveckling - vi kallar det för Power of sharing
* Stark företagskultur - utsedda till Sveriges bästa arbetsplats av Great Place to Work
* Många teamleveranser!


**Ansökan**
 Ansök enkelt genom att antingen ladda upp ditt CV eller länka direkt till ditt LinkedIn-konto via annonsen på vår hemsida! Observera att vi inte tar emot ansökningar inkomna via mail.
   

  

 Om du har frågor om tjänsten eller oss som bolag är du välkommen att kontakta Kalle Forsell, [email protected]
   

  

 Sopra Steria har kunder och projekt som kan kräva säkerhetsgodkännande på olika nivåer.
   

  

 Ytterligare information
   

  

 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: Utvecklare inom ServiceNow
description:
Är du en erfaren utvecklare med egenskaper för att agera som lösningsarkitekt och som har erfarenhet inom systemförvaltning av ServiceNow? Är du strukturerad och har förmåga att se helheten i arbetet? Vill du bidra med din kompetens i en myndighet som bidrar till att göra Sverige och världen säkrare? Då kan du vara den vi på FMV söker som förstärkning till vårt team som ansvarar för förvaltning och utveckling av ServiceNow.
 



  





**Arbetsuppgifter** 




 Som utvecklare inom ServiceNow på FMV kommer du verka i navet mellan teknik och verksamhet och ta dig an arbetsuppgifter som både utvecklare och lösningsarkitekt. Bland annat kommer du att vara med och utveckla, designa och implementera lösningar som möter verksamhetens behov, i samverkan med andra lösningsarkitekter inom närliggande områden. Du kommer med andra ord både jobba med traditionell utveckling samt agera som arkitekt inom ServiceNow-plattformen.
 



  





 Tjänsten är placerad i Stockholm.
 



  





**Vi söker dig som** 




 Du har en genomförd högskole-/universitetsutbildning inom relevant område för tjänsten, eller har motsvarande kompetens förvärvad på annat sätt. För tjänsten behöver du tidigare ha arbetat som utvecklare inom ServiceNow med erfarenhet inom plattformen och dess olika moduler. Vi ser att du har färdigheter inom av systemutveckling och/eller scripting (JavaScript, Python eller dylikt) samt webbutvecklingsverktyg som exempelvis HTML och CSS. Då vi nu arbetar med ITSM-implementationer ser vi att du dels har kunskap och tidigare erfarenhet om dessa arbetsflöden och arkitektur.
 



  





 Erfarenhet av lösningsarkitektur/mjukvaruarkitektur samt certifieringar inom ServiceNow, PM3, ITIL 4 är meriterande. Likaså goda kunskaper om olika projekt- och testverktyg som DevOps eller motsvarande.
 



  





 Som person är du trygg och stabil med en god självinsikt. Du har god förmåga att se helheten och har egenskaper som effektiv och uthållig i alla situationer. Du är strukturerad och leder, motiverar och förser andra med de befogenheter som krävs för att effektivt nå gemensamma mål.
 



 Du har en positiv inställning till ditt arbete och kan skapa engagemang, delaktighet och motivation för att bygga goda samarbeten. Du lyssnar, kommunicerar och löser problem på ett konstruktivt sätt. Du behöver vara självgående och ta ansvar för dina uppgifter, driva ditt arbete och ta egna initiativ för att komma framåt. Du behöver dessutom vara duktig på att planera och organisera ditt arbete på ett strukturerat och effektivt sätt.
 



  





 Du behärskar svenska och engelska väl, både i tal och skrift.
 



  





 Vi lägger stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper.
 



  





**Om oss** 




 Infrastrukturstaben ansvarar för utveckling, förvaltning och drift och av informationssystem. Arbetar för att styra myndigheten inom IT-området genom att planera, genomföra och följa upp IT-verksamheten inom FMV. Avdelningen IT Utveckling och Förvaltning ansvarar för utveckling och förvaltning av applikationer, både för FMV:s eget behov och för Försvarsmakten.
 



  





 FMV är en myndighet som sorterar under Försvarsdepartementet med Försvarsmakten som tillsynsmyndighet. Vi använder oss av Försvarsmaktens säkerhetsregelverk KSF som grundläggande i FMV:s ackrediteringsmetod för säkerhetsgodkännande av våra informationssystem.
 



  





**FMV – Försvarets materielverk** 




 På FMV är du med och bidrar till att göra Sverige och världen säkrare. Vi upphandlar, utvecklar och levererar materiel och tjänster till det svenska försvaret. I vår vision ”Rätt materiel för ett starkare försvar” ryms vårt arbete och våra leveranser till Försvarsmakten av allt från helikoptrar, ubåtar, stridsflygplan och snörade kängor till kompasser, radarstationer, pansarterrängbilar och kuddar. Bredden i vårt uppdrag ger dig möjligheten att jobba med spännande innehåll, människor och projekt.
 



  





 På FMV jobbar vi aktivt utifrån utvecklande medarbetarskap, som är en modell för att utveckla samarbete, främja ansvarstagande och skapa engagemang för att ta tillvara på den initiativförmåga som vi alla besitter. Vi sätter värde på ömsesidigt förtroende och på ett hållbart arbetsliv. Därför erbjuder vi alla våra anställda ett brett utbud av utbildningar, kompetensutveckling och träning. Ifall arbetsuppgifterna tillåter kommer du ha möjlighet att arbeta upp till två dagar på distans/vecka.
 








**Vill du vara med och utveckla framtidens försvar?** 




 Sök tjänsten via FMV:s webbplats. Vi vill ha dina ansökningshandlingar på svenska och för en mer inkluderande rekryteringsprocess tar vi inte emot några personliga brev.
 



 Våra fackliga företrädare är Stefan Hållander (SACO), Lena Sköld Gunnarsson (OFR/S), Lars Mörrby (OFR/O) och Peter Andersson (SEKO). Alla nås på telefon 08-782 4000 (FMV Växel).
 



 Har du frågor om rekryteringsprocessen är du varmt välkommen att kontakta ansvarig rekryteringskonsult Carina Eyoma på Experis IT, carina.eyoma@se.experis.com alt. 073-086 22 75. Har du frågor om tjänsten ber vi dig kontakta chef Magnus Stendrake IT Utveckling och samordning på telefon 08-782 4000 (FMV Växel).
 



  





 Sista ansökningsdag är 2025-02-28.
 



  





**Välkommen med din ansökan.** 




*FMV finns för landet, i många delar av landet. För att jobba hos oss behöver du vara svensk medborgare och genomgå en säkerhetsprövning, i enlighet med säkerhetsskyddslagen. Vi välkomnar sökande med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter. Vi tillämpar provanställning och som anställd kommer du att krigsplaceras utifrån totalförsvarets behov. Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via FMV:s webbplats eller via vår registratur. Vi har redan gjort vårt medieval, därför undanber vi oss samtal från dig som vill sälja annons- och rekryteringstjänster.*

title: Senior Data Visualization Engineer
description:
**Craft:**
 Technology & Development
   

  

**Job Description:**
**Senior Data Visualization Engineer**
**Job Description:**
 Candy Crush Saga is one of the biggest games in the world, entertaining millions of players every day, and we are looking for people who are as excited as we are about making it even bigger and better. Working in a talented cross-functional team, you will play a key role in the development of Dashboards, tools and analytical products to deliver insight and business information.
   

  

 We’re looking for a Senior Data Visualization Engineer to help us deliver groundbreaking new Dashboards and tools and support our suite of artisan built products and front end tools. If you’re excited by pushing the boundaries of visualization in business intelligence and reporting then this is the role for you!
   

  

 We are a complete end to end Data Warehouse team given autonomy to design and build products to help our business users understand and make decisions on our high volume data.
   

  

**Your Role Within Our Kingdom:**
* You are a developer with a genuine interest in developing both your code and design skills
* Build new Dashboards using React and Cube.js
* Maintain the current suite of Dashboards and our other custom web tools
* Collaborate with our Principal data visualization engineer to constantly improve our code and infrastructure
* Contribute to our front end design strategy
* Contribute to the design of innovative data visualizations
* Translate designs into functioning and maintainable code


**Skills to create thrills:**
* Experience of React and Typescript
* Experience of HTML, CSS and JavaScript
* An appreciation for design and a desire to make your work fit design specifications
* Awareness of data visualization best practices
* Attention to detail
* Enjoy problem solving and trying new things


**:**
* Next.js
* Any data visualization library (echarts, d3, etc.)
* SQL
* React Native
* Node.js
* Cube.js
* Cloud services (GCP, AWS, etc.)
* Kubernetes
* GitHub


**About King**
 At King, we're Making the World Playful. Heard of Candy Crush? We're the creators behind it. With game studios in Stockholm, Malmö, London, Barcelona and Berlin, and offices in Dublin, San Francisco, New York, and Malta, we have a 20-year history of delivering some of the world's most iconic games in the mobile gaming industry and are on a mission to level-up the little moments for our more than 200 million active monthly users. But we aren't just crushing it with candies, we're also behind Farm Heroes, Bubble Witch, Pet Rescue and loads of other sweet games. As a leading interactive entertainment company for the mobile world, King is part of Activision Blizzard, which was acquired by Microsoft.
   

  

**A Great Saga Needs All Sorts of Heroes**
 King strives to be a place where everyone can be their most authentic self. We recognize that diversity, equity and inclusion is a vital and continuous conversation, and that change only happens when we all come together. It’s our mission to build a diverse and inclusive Kingdom for our people, players, and community.
   

  

**Making the World Playful**
 Making the World Playful is our mission – it’s the thread that connects our people, our players, and our passion for our games. Let’s face it, who doesn’t love a bit of fun?
   

  

 Kingsters are seriously playful: creative thinkers who balance art and science to bring moments of magic to millions daily. But our players aren’t the only ones that can level-up. We’re always looking for ways to champion each other and make what’s already great, even better.
   

  

 So, if this feels like a fun way to spend your days, and you share our passion, our values, and our hunger to shape the future, join us in Making the World Playful.
   

  

 Applications need to be in English.
   

  

 Discover King at careers.king.com

title: Senior SW Project manager
description:
Do you want to work in a global company where you can contribute to a more sustainable food production? DeLaval is a leading developer, manufacturer and supplier of solutions for dairy farmers around the world. As a company built on innovation, we constantly work to find ways of helping our customers do more with less.
   

  

 We are now looking for a Senior SW Project Manager with experience from development of Embedded Systems and/or Cyber Security to the DeLaval Project Management Office.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Project and Program execution Lead the planning, execution, and delivery of the project, while efficiently managing dependencies and risk efficiently.
* Team Leadership and Collaboration Build efficient program and project teams, provide direction, and fostering open communication to achieve objectives efficiently.
* Stakeholder collaboration Manage relationships and communications with stakeholders, including upper management, product management, IT, engineering, supply chain, and market, ensuring transparency and involvement.
* Strategic planning Establishing goals and plans by understanding and aligning with long-term organizational goals, securing the project expected benefit and business case.


**Qualifications And Experience**
* Extensive experience in managing software development projects within a product development environment, preferably in complex systems integrating both hardware and software components.
* Several years of experience with agile methodologies, combined with the ability to adapt to hybrid approaches incorporating elements of a more traditional waterfall model.
* Master of Science in Engineering or equivalent degree.
* Experience of SW cyber security is beneficial


 As a person, you are driven and well-structured at both operational and strategic levels, with a strong customer focus. You are humble, collaborative, and an excellent communicator. Your problem-solving skills and experience in intercultural collaboration enable you to work seamlessly across diverse teams at all levels and functions within an organization.
   

  

**Working at DeLaval**
 Our core values Passion, People, Professionals and Partnerships connect individuals across entities and geographies. Success is far more than knowledge – it is strongly related to behaviours. At DeLaval we are all guided by our three preferred behaviours: Set Direction, Make Things Happen and One DeLaval.
   

  

 We offer you a workplace like no other, where state-of-the-art technology goes hand in hand with animal welfare. DeLaval is a part of the Tetra Laval Group together with Tetra Pak and Sidel.
   

  

**In Addition, We Offer**
* A secure employment and benefits from the collective agreement (occupational pension, work-related accident insurance, parental leave, reduction of working hours).
* Parental leave compensation (approx. 10 percent of the employee's monthly salary).
* Wellness contribution of 4 000 SEK/year.
* Private health insurance.
* Flexible working hours.
* 30 days paid annual leave.


**Additional Information**
 The position will be part of the Division Product Development and will report to the Swedish PMO manager at Product Development. This is a full-time permanent position based at DeLaval’s headquarters in Tumba, south of Stockholm. We offer a hybrid workplace model, allowing flexibility to work remotely. Travel will be part of this position.
   

  

 We review applications ongoing. We do not accept applications via email, however if you have any questions regarding the role or the recruitment process don’t hesitate to contact us.
   

  

**Contact**
 Hiring manager: Susanne Dale Ekdahl, susanne.daleekdahl@delaval.com
   

  

 Recruiter: Mathias Gunnstedt, mathias.gunnstedt@delaval.com
   

  

**About DeLaval**
 Our vision is to make sustainable food production possible. As a company built on innovation, we constantly work to find ways of helping our customers, dairy farmers, do more with less by providing world-leading milking equipment and solutions.
   

  

 Today, DeLaval has approximately 4,500 passionate professionals operating in more than 100 markets around the world. DeLaval is part of the Tetra Laval Group.
   

  

 See more at corporate.delaval.com

title: Utvecklare Dynamics 365 F&O
description:
Om rollen
   

  

 Vill du vara en del av
 **Sveriges Bästa Arbetsplats 2023** 
 , utsedd av Great Place to Work? Sopra Steria är ett ledande IT-konsult- och managementbolag som flera år i rad har utsetts till
 **Karriärföretag** 
 och rankas av Gartner som en av de fem bästa inom Digital Transformation. Vi söker nu en driven utvecklare med erfarenhet av Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations för att förstärka vårt team.
   

  

**Om Rollen**
 I rollen som utvecklare inom Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations kommer du att ansvara för att utveckla och integrera affärslösningar för våra kunder inom olika branscher. Du kommer att arbeta med att anpassa systemet efter kundernas specifika behov och integrera Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations med andra system för att säkerställa smidiga affärsflöden.
   

  

**Dina Huvudsakliga Arbetsuppgifter Kommer Att Inkludera**
* Utveckling och anpassning av funktionalitet i Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations med hjälp av X++ och C#.
* Skapande och hantering av integrationer med hjälp av Azure Integration Services för att koppla Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations med externa system.
* Design och implementering av integrationer via REST API för att möjliggöra sömlös kommunikation mellan olika plattformar och system.
* Delta i förstudier och workshops för att förstå kundens behov och krav samt bidra till lösningsdesign.
* Testning och validering av utvecklade lösningar för att säkerställa att de möter både funktionella och tekniska krav.


**Vi Söker Dig Som**
* Har minst 3 års erfarenhet som utvecklare inom Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations.
* Har goda kunskaper i X++, C# och Azure Integration Services.
* Har tidigare erfarenhet av att arbeta med integrationer mellan Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations och andra system via REST API.
* Har ett starkt intresse för att arbeta med tekniska lösningar som stödjer affärsprocesser och vill bidra med din expertis till innovativa projekt.


**Vad vi erbjuder:** 
 Hos Sopra Steria får du möjlighet att arbeta med några av de mest spännande kunderna och projekten på marknaden. Vi erbjuder en dynamisk och stödjande arbetsmiljö där du får chansen att växa och utvecklas inom ditt område. Som en del av vårt Business Applications-team kommer du att samarbeta med erfarna kollegor som delar din passion för teknik och utveckling.
   

  

**Ansök:** 
 Om du vill vara med och forma framtidens affärslösningar och arbeta i en organisation som sätter sina medarbetare i fokus, skicka in din ansökan idag! För frågor om tjänsten, kontakta Christer Söderholm på [email protected]
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Ytterligare information
   

  

 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.
   

  

 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: Lead Magento Developer
description:
**HAYPP GROUP**
 We address one of the world’s biggest problems – how to end smoking. There are 1,1 billion smokers in the world. Around 8 million people die every year from smoking-related diseases. Our goal is to significantly reduce death rates, save lives and inspire people to choose healthier enjoyment. How? By offering people safer nicotine online.
   

  

 Haypp Group is one of the Nordics’ leading e-commerce groups with ten store brands, present in seven countries where we serve more than 1 million active consumers. Through brands such as Snusbolaget.se, Northerner.com, Nicokick.com etc., we sell nicotine pouches, Swedish style snus online as well as disposable vapes. With our headquarters located on Östgötagatan in Stockholm we are 200 team members mainly but not exclusively based in Sweden. Also, we are an innovative and fast-moving company that is growing rapidly, driving sustainable business and are changing the world in the process. We are currently on an exciting expansion journey, converting more and more smokers to healthier alternatives across all our markets globally.
   

  

**THE ROLE**
 As we are growing in the US market we are looking for a Lead Magento Developer and Lead to help develop and scale our Ecommerce platforms in the US market to the next level. We are currently using Adobe Commerce (Magento 2) as the E-com solution for our US sites Nicokick and Northerner.
   

  

 As our Lead Magento Developer and Tech Lead, you will play a pivotal role in our journey by:
   

  

* Strengthening our expertise: Building a robust foundation of knowledge about Magento and the e-commerce platform.
* Enhancing code quality: Leading more thorough code reviews and ensuring adherence to best practices.
* Driving efficiency: Accelerating development processes and implementing improvements beyond the scope of the Product Owner role.
* Collaborating effectively: Acting as a bridge between technical teams and internal stakeholders to provide clear specifications and better guidance.
* Exploring opportunities in an attractive market: Play a key role in developing cuttingedge solutions for one of the most dynamic and fast-paced industries.


**The following will be some of your daily work tasks:**
* Lead the technical direction of our Magento platform development.
* Collaborate closely with technical teams and internal stakeholders.
* Conduct hands-on development work, including customizations, improvements, and troubleshooting.
* Mentor and guide team members to foster a culture of technical excellence.
* Proactively identify opportunities to optimize processes and solutions.
* Ensure high-quality deliverables through detailed code reviews and testing.


**What We Want From You**
* Extensive experience in PHP and Magento development: You’re a seasoned developer with a deep understanding of Magento architecture and best practices.
* Tech Leadership skills: Proven ability to take ownership, lead projects, and inspire confidence in others.
* Hands-on and proactive mindset: You thrive in a hands-on environment and are eager to drive tangible improvements.
* Excellent collaboration and communication skills: You can interact effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders and bridge gaps between teams.
* Language: Fluency in English as it is the working language at Haypp Group


**Nice to have:**
* Worked with Scrum and other agile methodologies
* Worked with Jira and Confluence
* Worked with Hyvä Theme and Hyvä Checkout
* Experience with Cloudflare
* Experience with Datadog


**What We Offer**
 We are a value driven company with our values
 *We team up* 
 ,
 *Innovation Drives Us* 
 ,
 *No Douchebags* 
 and
 *Going the Extra Mile* 
 at the heartbeat of everything that we do. With us you can always expect to get help from people who want to achieve things together and to be able to speak your mind in every social constellation you are part of. We highly value all ideas no matter where they come from, and we are not afraid to try new things out. We are also welcoming, inclusive and everyone at Haypp Group has a voice. In addition, we seize opportunities by putting in hands-on, hard work and celebrating when we reach our goals. With us, you should always feel safe, appreciated and valued but at the same time challenged and excited.
   

  

 Because we recognize that our team members are our most important differentiator, we offer our team members generous benefits. We offer the following perks to everyone at Haypp Group:
   

  

* Premium ITP1 occupational pension savings plan
* Insurance plan, including private healthcare
* 30 days of paid vacation
* Parental pay lift
* Wellness allowance of 5,000 SEK per year
* Lots of social happenings


**SEND US YOUR APPLICATION TODAY!**
 If this sounds like a place where you would want to contribute and grow, let us know you’re interested by submitting your application! Apply with your CV, a cover letter, through Linkedin or in any other way you feel represents you in the clearest possible way. All ways of connecting work for us!
   

  

 Haypp Group is committed to equality and diversity, and we welcome applications from all qualified individuals regardless of ethnicity, religion, age, gender, sexual orientation, disability, and marital status. We want to offer you great recruitment experience, and if there is anything we can do to make you more comfortable in the process with us, please let us know.
   

  

 If you have any questions about the role or what it’s like to work at Haypp Group in general, feel free to reach out to our responsible recruiter Viktoria Sobolewski or at viktoria.sobolewski@hayppgroup.com. We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

 The Haypp Group is spearheading the global transformation from smoking to healthier product alternatives. With origins in Scandinavia our extensive experience from pioneering markets in smoke free alternatives, as well as being a leader in the e-commerce sector, we now fully bring our vision to a global scale.
   

  

 With ten e-commerce brands, the Haypp Group is present in seven countries where we serve more than 950 000 consumers.

title: Driver Display Application Development Technical Lead C++
description:
Scania is undergoing a transformation from being a leading supplier of trucks, buses, and engines to providing complete and sustainable transport solutions. Together with TRATON and our sister brands MAN, Volkswagen Truck & Bus, and International, we are working to shape the future of mobility with innovative and environmentally conscious solutions. Our values – customer first, respect, team spirit, responsibility, and elimination of waste – are at the heart of everything we do. Together, we are at the forefront of creating a sustainable future.
   

  

**Role Summary**
 If you are interested in developing functionality directly noticeable by our drivers, enjoy seeing the results of your work in vehicles and feel excited creating a product together with your team in a bigger context, you are the one we are looking for!
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
 We are seeking a senior developer to join our team as Technical Lead for our C++ developers working with the application layer for the driver display.
   

  

 As Technical Lead, you will:
   

  

  

* Guide and mentor: Play a key role in guiding the other developers and make sure that the ways we use our technical capabilities are optimal.
* Ensure quality: Contribute to a premium quality driver interface by leveraging the full potential of our ECU system and development tools.
* Collaborate: Participate in ECU System wide discussions and activities.
* Drive Technical domain for application C++ developers.
* Lead the Community of Practice for this area.
* Guide code reviews to maintain code quality and share knowledge with the team.
* Ensure code is clear, maintainable and follows industry best practices.
* Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies.


**Who You Are**
* Extensive experience as a C++ developer, particularly in embedded systems.
* Strong communication skills and ability to work in a team-oriented environment.
* Experience and knowledge in QNX, and AUTOSAR Adaptive.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Familiarity with agile methods and ways of working.
* University or higher education degree in an area such as computer science, embedded systems, electrical engineering, or similar.


**Nice to Have:**
* Experience with Qt/QML for cross-platform UI development.
* Understanding of security and data protection in embedded systems.


 As we are a team of mixed nationalities, our daily language is English. Therefore, proficiency in written and spoken English is required. Swedish is beneficial, but not mandatory.
   

  

**This is Us**
**Our department**
 At Cluster Functions, we are responsible for implementing the GUI and business logic for our driver display functionality. We ensure that the driver receives the right information at the right time to complete the transport mission efficiently and safely.
   

  

 We are moving towards a continuous development phase where we will, among other things, work on extending the product content for our BEV vehicles.
   

  

 We are also looking forward to extending our collaboration with Traton Group colleagues in the near future, learning and expanding our horizons together.
   

  

**Our teams**
 We have three End-to-End teams (E2E) within Cluster Development Domain consisting of Product Owner and Scrum Master, Requirements engineer, GUI and application developers and System Testers. Together they can handle new customer requirements for driver display entirely within the same team.
   

  

 Each competence domain is led by a Technical Lead, whose role is to:
   

  

  

* Ensure that we have a common way of working.
* Foster continuous learning among colleagues across all teams.
* Identify and prioritize technical needs for the product backlog.


 The teams consists of a mix of onsite and remote developers with various levels of experience and diverse nationalities We work together seamlessly, regardless of location.
   

  

 We are good at taking care of each other, ensuring that we learn from shared knowledge along the way. Commitment and Team Spirit are qualities that stand out.
   

  

**Scania Offers**
 We offer a dynamic, flexible workplace with hybrid work options, including Scania Sergel and Midway hubs. With a structured development plan and courses, Scania supports your career growth both locally and internationally.
   

  

 Benefits include training at our health center Gröndal or wellness allowance, result bonus, flexible hours, and company car leasing. Scania also hosts events for employees and their families, and Stockholm residents enjoy direct access to Södertälje via Scania Job express buses.
   

  

**Application**
 Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes. Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-02-09. Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.
   

  

**We look forward to your application!**

title: Data & AI Architect
description:
Avanade is on a mission to become the top Microsoft Data & AI consultancy in the Nordics, delivering award-winning expertise and innovative solutions. We are seeking an experienced Data & AI Architect to join our team and drive this vision forward in the Swedish market.
   

  

 Avanade is the leading global provider of digital, cloud, AI and advisory services, industry solutions and design-led experiences across the Microsoft ecosystem. Founded in 2000 as a joint venture between Accenture LLP and Microsoft Corporation, Avanade has more certifications, Gold-level competencies and most valued professionals (MVPs) than any other Microsoft partner. Every day, our 60,000 professionals in 26 countries innovate responsibly to make a genuine human impact for our clients, their employees and their customers.
   

  

**Come join us**
 In this role, you will combine technical depth, consulting acumen, and exceptional communication skills. You’ll engage with client C-suites as a trusted advisor while also guiding and sparring with developer teams. Your contributions will shape the future of Data & AI in Sweden while delivering measurable business value to clients.
   

  

**Skills And Experiences**
**Skills and Experiences**
* Deep Technical Expertise: Proven delivery experience in at least two of the following: Reporting solutions on Azure (e.g., Databricks, Microsoft Fabric, Power BI) with modern architecture patterns. Data & AI operational strategy and business alignment. Generative AI use cases using Databricks Mosaic AI and Microsoft AI Services.
* Strategic Communication: Confidence in engaging with executives and presenting complex solutions in clear business terms.
* Developer Engagement: Ability to collaborate with and mentor developer teams to ensure alignment and quality in delivery.
* Technical Leadership: Experience leading teams in delivering impactful Data & AI projects.
* Languages: Fluency in Swedish (spoken and written) is strongly preferred. English fluency is required.


**In Addition, These Will Help You Stand Out**
* Azure certifications such as Solutions Architect Expert or Data Engineer Associate.
* Experience with CI/CD and DevOps in Data & AI projects.
* Familiarity with modern data architectures such as Lakehouse or Data Vault.
* Cross-functional leadership experience in global or regional teams.


**About You**
**Characteristics that can spell success for this role:**
* Consultative, collaborative, analytical
* Resilient, adaptable, flexible
* Humble leader, strong negotiator, relationship builder
* Passionate about tech and engaging with and advising clients


**What You'll Do**
**Solution Delivery**
* Design and deliver large-scale Data & AI solutions that align with client goals and modern best practices.
* Provide technical leadership in at least two of the following areas: Reporting Solutions: Azure Databricks, Microsoft Fabric, Power BI, using modern architectural patterns (e.g., Delta, Lambda, Kappa). Data & AI Strategy: Creating operational models and aligning AI initiatives with business goals. Generative AI: Leveraging Databricks Mosaic AI and Microsoft AI Services.


**Client Engagement**
* Act as a thought leader and trusted advisor to C-suite executives, translating technical concepts into actionable business strategies.
* Focus on the Swedish market, building strong relationships with local clients and stakeholders.
* Support pre-sales activities and proactively originate opportunities by identifying client challenges and aligning them with Avanade’s capabilities.


**Team Collaboration**
* Mentor junior team members and ensure delivery quality across projects.
* Collaborate across teams to maintain excellence in delivery and align solutions with business growth objectives.


**Thought Leadership**
* Contribute to Avanade’s thought leadership initiatives, such as speaking engagements and content creation, to showcase our Data & AI expertise in the Nordics.
* Advocate for modern Data & AI technologies and methodologies both internally and externally.


**Learn more**
 Avanade is the leading global provider of digital, cloud, AI and advisory services, industry solutions and design-led experiences across the Microsoft ecosystem. Founded in 2000 as a joint venture between Accenture LLP and Microsoft Corporation, Avanade has more certifications, Gold-level competencies and most valued professionals (MVPs) than any other Microsoft partner. Every day, our 60,000 professionals in 26 countries innovate responsibly to make a genuine human impact for our clients, their employees and their customers.
   

  

 To learn more about the types of projects our Analytics team works on check out this information
   

  

* Thyssenkrupp Materials Services uses data to help strike a delicate operational balance https://www.avanade.com/en-gb/clients/thyssenkrupp
* What matters to SSE Renewables is innovating for a sustainable future https://www.avanade.com/en-gb/clients/sse-renewables-ai
* Hachette UK enables employees with machine learning-driven contract searches https://www.avanade.com/en-gb/clients/hachette-automated-identification
* Marston Holdings identifies significant cloud savings https://www.avanade.com/en-gb/clients/marston-holdings


 Interested in knowing what’s going on inside Avanade? Check out our blogs:
   

  

 Avanade Insights – exchange ideas that drive tomorrow’s innovation https://www.avanade.com/en/blogs/avanade-insights
   

  

 Inside Avanade – explore what life is like working at Avanade https://www.avanade.com/en/blogs/inside-avanade
   

  

**Applications will be reviewed from Monday 6th January 2025**
**Enjoy your career**
**Some Of The Best Things About Working At Avanade**
* Opportunity to work for Microsoft’s Global Alliance Partner of the Year (14 years in a row), with exceptional development and training (minimum 80 hours per year for training and paid certifications)
* Real-time access to technical and skilled resources globally
* Dedicated career advisor to encourage your growth
* Engaged and helpful coworkers genuinely interested in you


 Find out more about some of our benefits: https://www.avanade.com/en/career/benefits
   

  

**A great place to work**
 As you bring your skills and abilities to Avanade, you will get distinctive experiences, limitless learning, and ambitious growth in return. As we continue to build our diverse and inclusive culture, we become even more innovative and creative, helping us better serve our clients and communities. You’ll join a community of smart, supportive collaborators to lift, mentor, and guide you, and to lean on your expertise. You get a company purpose-built for business-critical, leading-edge technology solutions, committed to improving the way humans work, interact, and live. It’s all here, so take a closer look!
   

  

 We work hard to provide an inclusive, diverse culture with a deep sense of belonging for all our employees. Visit our Inclusion & Diversity page
   

  

 Create a future for our people that focuses on
   

  

* Expanding your thinking
* Experimenting courageously
* Learning and pivoting


 Inspire greatness in our people by
   

  

* Empowering every voice
* Encouraging boldness
* Celebrating progress


 Accelerate the impact of our people by
   

  

* Amazing the client
* Prioritizing what matters
* Acting as one


 We work hard to provide an inclusive, diverse culture with a deep sense of belonging for all our employees. Avanade believes that all persons are entitled to equal employment opportunities, and we do not discriminate against our employees, applicants, or job seekers because of their race, colour, gender, religion, national origin, disability, veteran status, age, marital status, sexual orientation, genetic information, gender identity, or any other protect group status as defined by law.

title: Senior IT Domain Architect
description:
**🚀 Join Our Team VIPAS AB as a 🚀
   

  

 Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our**
**About VIPAS**
 Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals—efficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that’s exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.
   

  

**Job Description**
 You will be responsible for
 **conducting a current-state analysis** 
 , leading
 **deep-dive interviews and workshops** 
 , and transforming insights into
 **future-proof architectural plans** 
 . The focus will be on
 **economic architecture** 
 and developing a
 **technical roadmap** 
 aligned with organizational needs.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Conduct current-state analysis using existing materials, deep-dive interviews, and workshops.
* Develop future-proof architectural plans aligned with organizational needs.
* Lead enterprise/domain architecture initiatives, ensuring scalability and sustainability.
* Manage and analyze information flows, defining scope and optimizing processes.
* Design and implement economic IT architecture and technical roadmaps.
* Communicate and document complex IT solutions in a clear and structured manner.
* Collaborate with stakeholders to align IT strategies with business objectives.
* Provide technical leadership and guidance within large organizations


**Requirements**
* Competence Level 4 (9–12 years of experience).
* Educational Background: Bachelor's or master’s in information systems, Engineering, or Economics, with experience as a Solution Architect, Senior Developer, Enterprise Architect, or Domain Architect.
* Experience in: Conducting current-state assessments and translating insights into actionable architectural plans.
* Proficiency in Swedish (spoken and written).
* Managing and analysing information flows, identifying connections, defining scope, and communicating complex information in a clear manner.
* Economic architecture and developing future-proof technical roadmaps in this area.


**Why Join Us?**
 Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.
   

  

 You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!
   

  

 Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at swathianantu@vipas.se &contact me at +46760294155
   

  

 Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.
   

  

**How To Apply**
 Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!
   

  

 Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Technical Sales Engineers
company_industry: Aviation and Aerospace Component Manufacturing, Defense and Space Manufacturing, and Manufacturing
description:
*Everaxis är en världsledande innovatör av högteknologiska lösningar till kommunikationsutrustning i utmanande miljöer.* 




*Vi erbjuder skräddarsydda roterande mikrovågslösningar till våra kunder inom radar för flygtrafikledning och väder, militära övervaknings och ledningssystem för stridsflygplan, marina- och markbaserade radarsystem. Var med på vår tillväxtresa som spänner från yttre rymden ner till de djupaste haven!* 




  





**Vill du bli en del av en framgångsrik och växande verksamhet inom Aerospace & Defence? Vi letar nu efter två drivna Sales Engineers med olika specialiseringar, en skicklig Key Account Manager och en innovativ Business Developer – redo att stärka vårt framgångsrika säljteam i Kista och ta oss till nya höjder!** 




  





**DIN FRAMTIDA ROLL** 




  





**Två roller med tydliga fokusområden** 




 Rollerna som Business Developer och Key Account Manager har många likheter – båda innebär att arbeta med avancerade, kundanpassade produkter, långsiktiga säljprocesser och nära dialog med kunder och produktionen. Den avgörande skillnaden ligger i fokusområdena:
 


* **Key Account Manager** 
 : Här ligger fokus på att utveckla och fördjupa relationer med våra befintliga kunder, där cirka 70 % av din tid ägnas åt kundvård och vidareutveckling.
* **Business Developer** 
 : Här är fokus på att identifiera och bearbeta nya affärsmöjligheter och skapa relationer med nya kunder, där cirka 70 % av din tid handlar om nykundsbearbetning.



 Vi tror att din personlighet kommer vara avgörande för vilken av rollerna som passar dig bäst. Är du en relationsbyggare som trivs med att vårda och utveckla långsiktiga kundrelationer? Då är rollen som Key Account Manager något för dig. Är du istället en driven, nyfiken och entreprenöriell person som brinner för att hitta nya affärsmöjligheter? Då kommer du att trivas som Business Developer.
 



  





 Som en del av vårt framgångsrika säljteam får du:
 


* **Ansvara för hela säljcykeln** 
 : Från första kontakt till avslut, med en säljcykel som ofta sträcker sig över två år.
* **Global närvaro** 
 : Representera oss på 7–10 internationella mässor årligen, såsom Eurosatory, Paris Airshow och DSEI i London.
* **Internationell dialog** 
 : Du kommunicerar med kunder i olika tidszoner, där tydlighet och struktur är avgörande för att bygga framgångsrika relationer.
* **Samarbete med produktionen** 
 : Säkerställ att kundernas tekniska krav och behov uppfylls genom tätt samarbete med vårt produktionsteam och våra ingenjörer.



  





**DIN PROFIL** 




 Vi söker dig som har ett genuint
 **intresse för teknik** 
 och trivs med att arbeta i en miljö där tekniska detaljer och avancerade lösningar står i centrum. Du har minst fem års erfarenhet av teknisk försäljning och känner dig trygg med att hantera komplexa produkter och långsiktiga säljprocesser.
 



 För att lyckas i rollen bör du:
 


* Vara nyfiken och engagerad i försvarsindustrin, en bransch som just nu befinner sig i en
 **spännande tillväxtfas** 
 . Många kunder har nya projekt på gång, och du bör drivas av att bidra till deras framgång.
* Ha ett stort intresse av att resa – både nationellt och internationellt.
* Vara en lagspelare som trivs med att samarbeta med både kunder och kollegor i en
 **välfungerande och trevlig arbetsplatskultur** 
 .
* Vara flytande i både svenska och engelska.



 Du bör också vara målinriktad, anpassningsbar och trivas i en bransch som präglas av innovation, utveckling och trygghet.
 



  





**VI ERBJUDER DIG** 




  





 Hos Everaxis blir du en del av ett
 **framgångsrikt och växande företag** 
 inom en bransch som verkligen har medvind. Vi erbjuder en
 **trygg och stabil arbetsplats** 
 med goda resultat och en ledning som bryr sig om sina medarbetare.
 



 På vår produktionsanläggning i Kista tillverkar vi avancerade roterande system, främst för radar, och vi är stolta över att vara ett engagerat och inkluderande team på nästan 50 medarbetare. I våra nyrenoverade, fräscha lokaler arbetar vi tillsammans i en varm och familjär atmosfär där alla bidrar till vår framgång och gemenskap. Här får du chansen att bli en del av en dynamisk arbetsmiljö som präglas av samarbete, innovation och trivsel.
 



  





 Läs mer om våra produkter
 



  





**Intresserad?** 




 Om du är redo att utmana dig själv i en dynamisk och spännande roll, så ser vi fram emot att få din ansökan.
 



 Urval kommer att ske löpande och tjänsten kommer att tillsättas snarast möjligen.
 



  





 Everaxis samarbetar med Capus AB i den här rekryteringen. För mer information om rollen, kontakta Kristina Peltola kristina.peltola@capus.se +46 73-9948841 eller Andrea Odelius, andrea.odelius@capus.se +46 72 441 86 03
 



  





*Capus är ett av Nordens ledande rekryteringsföretag och erbjuder även interims- och konsulttjänster. Vi består av erfarna konsulter, en av marknadens största research- & analysavdelningar samt ett dedikerat marknadsföringsteam. Genom våra nätverk och gedigna research hittar vi kandidater som matchar våra kunders krav och behov. Vi är även en del av Talentor International som gör det möjligt att hjälpa våra kunder i 30+ länder runt om i världen. För oss är jämställdhet och mångfald viktigt och vi ger inte upp förrän vi har hittat marknadens absolut bästa kandidater! För mer information, se www.capus.se.*

title: Product Manager
description:
About Us: HVD Group is developing rapidly and is working hard to conquer the European market on software for craftsmen. We are a team of over 600 people in multiple locations working locally and globally to achieve our mission. Our teams are changing the industry and improving the everyday life of thousands of workers and businesses - from the family-owned to enterprise customers.
   

  

 Through innovative technology and years of expertise in the craftsmanship industry, we have successfully partnered with over 12,000 customers and gained the trust of 160,000 users in different segments of the industry. Our vision is to become the European leader in providing business systems for the craftsmen industry. To accomplish this ambitious goal, we need to continue building our teams with strong talent, just like yourself.
   

  

**Role Scope:**
 As a Product Manager at HVD Group, you will be an integral member of our product development team, responsible for further developing our product organization and driving product success mainly through three key pillars:
   

  

**Documentation:**
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to create and maintain comprehensive user manuals and technical documentation.
* Ensure that all product documentation is clear, accurate, and up-to-date.
* Work closely with Product Designers and Engineers to understand the technical aspects of each product for effective documentation.


**Feature Development:**
* Collaborate with various stakeholders, including customers, sales, marketing, and engineering teams, to gather requirements and define new features.
* Create mock-ups, user stories, and wireframes to illustrate new feature concepts.
* Ensure that new features align with customer needs and company goals.
* Oversee feature development from conception to delivery.
